channel.title: E Mail on Chris Short
channel.description: Recent content in E Mail on Chris Short

item.title: Tangible Intangibles: Questions to Ask While Being Interviewed
item.description: A few weeks ago a co-worker and I were discussing some things we really enjoyed about our work environment. It reminded me of a few key questions I ask (or things that I look for) during an interview that typically indicate whether or not a job is going to be a good fit or not. What do you use for e-mail? It is a simple question but the answer tells you a lot about a company.
